attributes.action: CREATE MORE OPPERTUNITIES FOR YOUNG PEOPLE
attributes.additional_details:
There is a current shortage of youth clubs and places for young people to go for help. There is alot of negative opinions on young people which are unfairly created. We want the existing youth clubs to be re-newed and more to be built to create better oppertunities for the youth.

HELP CREATE A BETTER GENERATION FOR THE FUTURE.
